mode.name: system_snapshot_group_list
mode.query: SELECT SG.id, SG.name AS GROUP_NAME, SGT.label AS GROUP_TYPE_LABEL, (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerGroupPerms WHERE user_id = :user_id AND server_group_id = SG.id) AS USER_PERMITTED_ACCESS FROM rhnServerGroup SG LEFT JOIN rhnServerGroupType SGT ON SG.group_type = SGT.id, rhnSnapshotServerGroup SSG, rhnSnapshot SN WHERE SN.id = :ss_id AND SN.server_id = :sid AND SN.id = SSG.snapshot_id AND SSG.server_group_id = SG.id

datasource_modes.query: SELECT SECURITY_ERRATA, BUG_ERRATA, ENHANCEMENT_ERRATA, GO.GROUP_ID AS ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_ADMINS, SERVER_COUNT, GO.MODIFIED, GO.MAX_MEMBERS, 'unknown' AS ALL_ERRATA, (SELECT CASE MAX(CASE PS.state WHEN 'OK' THEN 1 WHEN 'PENDING' THEN 2 WHEN 'UNKNOWN' THEN 3 WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 4 WHEN 'CRITICAL' THEN 5 END) WHEN 1 THEN 'OK' WHEN 2 THEN 'PENDING' WHEN 3 THEN 'UNKNOWN' WHEN 4 THEN 'WARNING' WHEN 5 THEN 'CRITICAL' END as ST FROM rhn_probe_state PS, rhnServerGroupMembership SGM LEFT JOIN rhn_check_probe CP ON SGM.server_id = CP.host_id WHERE PS.probe_id = CP.probe_id AND SGM.group_id = UMSG.server_group_id GROUP BY SGM.group_id) MONITORING_STATUS FROM rhnVisServerGroupOverviewLite GO, rhnUserManagedServerGroups UMSG WHERE GO.ORG_ID = :org_id AND UMSG.user_id = :user_id AND UMSG.server_group_id IN (%s) AND GO.GROUP_ID = UMSG.server_group_id ORDER BY UPPER(GROUP_NAME), GO.GROUP_ID

SELECT DISTINCT SG.id AS ID, SG.name AS GROUP_NAME FROM rhnServerGroup SG, rhnUserManagedServerGroups UMSG WHERE UMSG.user_id = :user_id AND UMSG.server_group_id = SG.id AND SG.group_type IS NULL ORDER BY UPPER(NAME)

mode.name: visible_groups_summary
mode.query: SELECT SECURITY_ERRATA, BUG_ERRATA, ENHANCEMENT_ERRATA, GO.GROUP_ID AS ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_ADMINS, SERVER_COUNT, GO.MODIFIED, GO.MAX_MEMBERS, (SELECT CASE MAX(CASE PS.state WHEN 'OK' THEN 1 WHEN 'PENDING' THEN 2 WHEN 'UNKNOWN' THEN 3 WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 4 WHEN 'CRITICAL' THEN 5 END) WHEN 1 THEN 'OK' WHEN 2 THEN 'PENDING' WHEN 3 THEN 'UNKNOWN' WHEN 4 THEN 'WARNING' WHEN 5 THEN 'CRITICAL' END as ST FROM rhn_probe_state PS, rhnServerGroupMembership SGM LEFT JOIN rhn_check_probe CP ON SGM.server_id = CP.host_id WHERE PS.probe_id = CP.probe_id AND SGM.group_id = UMSG.server_group_id GROUP BY SGM.group_id) MONITORING_STATUS FROM rhnServerGroupOverview GO, rhnUserManagedServerGroups UMSG, rhnServerGroup SG WHERE GO.ORG_ID = :org_id AND GO.GROUP_ID = UMSG.server_group_id AND SG.id = GO.group_id AND SG.group_type IS null AND UMSG.user_id = :user_id ORDER BY UPPER(GROUP_NAME), GO.GROUP_ID

mode.name: groups_a_system_is_in
mode.query: SELECT VSGM.group_id AS ID, SG.name AS GROUP_NAME, VSGM.group_type AS GROUP_TYPE_LABEL, (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerGroupPerms WHERE user_id = :user_id AND server_group_id = SG.id) AS USER_PERMITTED_ACCESS FROM rhnServerGroup SG, rhnVisServerGroupMembership VSGM, rhnUserServerGroupPerms USGP WHERE VSGM.org_id = :org_id AND VSGM.server_id = :sid AND VSGM.group_id = SG.id AND USGP.user_id = :user_id AND USGP.server_group_id = SG.id ORDER BY UPPER(SG.name)

mode.name: groups_a_system_is_in_unsafe
mode.query: SELECT SGM.group_id AS ID, SG.name AS GROUP_NAME FROM rhnServerGroup SG, rhnServerGroupMembership SGM WHERE SGM.org_id = :org_id AND SGM.server_id = :sid AND SGM.group_id = SG.id ORDER BY UPPER(SG.name)

mode.name: ssm_group_membership_select
mode.query: SELECT SGO.group_id ID, SGO.group_name FROM rhnServerGroup SG, rhnServerGroupOverview SGO WHERE SGO.org_id = :org_id AND SGO.group_id = SG.id AND SG.group_type IS NULL ORDER BY UPPER (SGO.group_name)
